name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Quizzes
description: This is a repository of quizzes APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Instructure
apis.description: Instructure makes software that makes smarter people. Products include Canvas LMS, Bridge and Canvas Network.

apis.name: OpenMinds
apis.description: OpenMinds is a learning platform that instantly transforms any content (your content or 3rd party content) into engaging learning apps. Your students play the apps on any platform to learn and master specific skills, such as vocabulary, spelling, grammar, punctuation and much more.
